CoreDesignPrinciples.Principle: Clean, uncluttered interfaces with purposeful white space
Focus on content hierarchy and user flow
Subtle shadows and borders for depth without distraction
Clear visual feedback for all interactive states

Typography.Hierarchy: Bold titles, medium body text, regular secondary text
Typography.OverlayText: Text shadows on overlay content for readability

ButtonDesign.Ghost: Transparent background, colored text and border

SingleCardApproach.Description: All content on a single screen should be presented within a single card unless otherwise needed.
SingleCardApproach.Benefit: Reduces visual noise and creates a unified, cohesive experience.
SingleCardApproach.Dividers: If content separation is needed, use a subtle line in gray color (#EDEEF1) as a divider.
SingleCardApproach.Headers: Section headers with icons for easy navigation

Overview.Description: Data tables are essential for displaying structured information in a scannable, organized format. They follow the single card principle while maintaining high performance and usability.
Overview.Library: TanStack Table v8 for performant, headless table functionality
Overview.Framework: Built with shadcn/ui table components for consistent styling

Container.Background: White background within rounded card container
Container.Shadows: Consistent with card shadow system (subtle elevation)

Headers.Background: Clean white background, no additional styling
Headers.Padding: 12px vertical, 16px horizontal for optimal touch targets
Headers.Sorting: Interactive sorting with arrow icons and hover states
Headers.Border: Bottom border only (#EDEEF1) to separate from data rows

DataRows.AlternateRows: No zebra striping - clean white background for all rows
DataRows.HoverState: Subtle background change (#F4F4F4) on row hover
DataRows.Typography: Regular weight, 14px text in #000000 for primary data
DataRows.SecondaryText: 12px text in #757575 for metadata and helper text

GlobalSearch.Icon: Search icon (16px) positioned left in input field

ColumnFilters.Dropdowns: Select components for categorical data (status, category)
ColumnFilters.RangeInputs: Number inputs for budget/price ranges with min/max fields
ColumnFilters.DatePickers: Calendar components for date range filtering

FilterChips.Container: Active filter badges displayed above table
FilterChips.Colors: Blue background (#0E54FF) with white text for active filters

Sorting.Headers: Clickable header buttons with sort direction indicators
Sorting.Icons: Arrow up/down icons (16px) to show sort direction
Sorting.States: Neutral, ascending, descending with visual feedback
Sorting.MultiSort: Support for multi-column sorting with priority indicators

Pagination.Elements: Previous/Next buttons, page size selector, row count display
Pagination.Info: Display current range and total count (e.g., "1-10 of 47 orders")

StatusBadges.Colors: Green for completed, blue for active, gray for draft states
StatusBadges.Text: Concise, single-word status labels when possible

Actions.PrimaryAction: Most important action uses primary button styling
Actions.SecondaryActions: Additional actions use outline or ghost variants
Actions.Icons: 16px icons with 4px margin for visual clarity

Currency.Symbol: Euro symbol (€) positioned after the number

Dates.Format: MMM dd, yyyy format for readability (e.g., "Jan 15, 2024")
Dates.Sorting: Proper datetime sorting regardless of display format
Dates.Relative: Consider relative dates for recent items ("2 hours ago")

Breakpoints.Mobile: Stack filters vertically, hide less critical columns
Breakpoints.Tablet: Show essential columns, horizontal scroll for overflow
Breakpoints.Desktop: Full table functionality with all columns visible

ColumnPriority.Essential: Always visible: primary identifier, status, actions
ColumnPriority.Important: Hidden on mobile: secondary data like dates, counts
ColumnPriority.Supplementary: Desktop only: metadata and additional context

TouchTargets.Minimum: 44px minimum height for all interactive elements
TouchTargets.Feedback: Visual and haptic feedback for touch interactions

PerformanceConsiderations.Virtualization: Use for tables with 100+ rows to maintain smooth scrolling
PerformanceConsiderations.LazyLoading: Load data progressively for large datasets
PerformanceConsiderations.Memoization: Memoize column definitions and complex cell renderers
PerformanceConsiderations.Debouncing: Debounce search/filter inputs to reduce API calls

AccessibilityFeatures.KeyboardNavigation: Full keyboard navigation with tab order
AccessibilityFeatures.ScreenReaders: Proper ARIA labels and table structure
AccessibilityFeatures.FocusManagement: Clear focus indicators and logical focus flow
AccessibilityFeatures.Announcements: Screen reader announcements for sort changes and updates

LoadingStates.Skeleton: Skeleton rows matching table structure during initial load
LoadingStates.Shimmer: Subtle shimmer animation for skeleton elements
LoadingStates.Filters: Disabled state for filters during data fetching

FiksatenExpressDesignLanguage.Summary: This design language creates a cohesive, professional, and user-friendly experience that scales across the entire Fiksaten Express platform while maintaining brand consistency and usability standards.
